main event: A witness in Oil City, Pennsylvania spotted a silver, oblong-shaped UFO with dark stripes or bands across the center, traveling from west to east during the day on May 15, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as shiny on one side and irregular in shape.
The witness observed the object for about 20 seconds.
The witness suggested the object resembled a Lockheed F-104 Starfighter, but without any other aircraft nearby.
The witness took a telescope observation of the object, which disappeared after about 45 seconds.
The witness contacted the Civilian Defense, who suggested they write to the Project Blue Book program about the sighting.
sighted object: silver, oblong-shaped UFO with dark stripes or bands
